name: Akuma's Pumpkin Pie
description:
Akuma's Pumpkin Pie is a chill point-and-click puzzle-adventure game about a little demon looking for his pumpkin pie’s special ingredient!

Help him navigate his haunted house by disassembling and reassembling little living dolls (full of personality!) to open the doors to reach the attic and retrieve his secret ingredient!

A project for the 1st Game JAM Univali + Xamk

Controls: Left Click (move & interact) | Right Click (Reassemble the dolls)

Univali, Campus Florianópolis

Art, Game Design - Gabriele Bonente & Beatriz Zardo

Programming - Gabriel Peixoto Gottschalk

Sound Design, Level Design - Ricardo Menoncin da Silva
